function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High levels of stress, depression, and anxiety due to stay-at-home mandates and lack of social connections.","Impact":"Decreased mental well-being and increased risk of mental health problems in the population.","Mitigation":"Implementing mental health support systems in built environments, promoting social connections, and providing financial stability.","Technologies":"Mental health apps, telemedicine, and virtual communication platforms.","People":"Population across the globe.","Owner":"Health organizations, government, and building professionals."},{"Description":"Increased concentration loss due to stay-at-home mandates and stress.","Impact":"Decreased productivity and cognitive function in the population.","Mitigation":"Implementing mental health support, stress reduction strategies, and promoting physical activity.","Technologies":"Psychometric tests, stress analysis tools, and wellness programs.","People":"Population across the globe.","Owner":"Health organizations, employers, and building professionals."}]}
